column4: How do I quit from a channel in irssi, I don't want to leave my session, just close down a channel (I opened #uubuntu :()
irssi has some very well done docs at their homepage.
i belive its '/window close  '  in the channel you wish to close.
- Where is the xsplash dir? You have peaked my interests :p
- Cheers
- Do you know where the funky changing space background is located? :p
same directgory - its the throbber
or ya mean the wallpaper? thats in the wallpapers dir.
they are in the wallpaper dirs

- Is there any way of contacting you outside of IRC? :p You probably know everything I want to know, it would be faser talking to you one-on-one (yes, could pm, but what about tomorrow? if I'm not on irc etc!!!)
i am always here on irc it seems like
theres some alterantivces to that applet. You could just find the icon (i think its a svg file) and rename/change it so its not loaded..

I really like the text style, i.e. "Applications Places System". My problem is the whole forcing panel size to be 24 pixels, I've seen some tutorials for changing the image, but was wanting to remove it all together. If I can point it to an image that doesn't exist, is that likely to load nothing?
err.. I thought ive enlarged the panel height and the icons rescaled to the higer image. thats the point of the svg icon
i dont worry about the image..  so no idea. i do recall some alternative applets taht can replace the whole  3 menus with like one single submenu setup. but i dont consider it worth worrying about
or you somehow ran it as root and goofed up the permissions on the file
you could remove the settings dirs perhaps.
or move them to some other dir/name and restart the browser
- Can you guide me on how-to either remove the settings directory or just move/rename them?
they are in some dir in your home. I dont use 'chromium' so i dont know what they are called
I *love* you :D
